title: Fontbit
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415101240/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415101240/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Fontbit**

'Fontbit' is an [Israeli](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415101240/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Israel) type foundry, which specializes in [Hebrew](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415101240/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hebrew) language fonts.
